/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are modern and sleek, their facades adorned with reflective glass windows that mirror the clear blue sky above. The street itself is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Amidst the urban landscape, patches of greenery can be spotted, providing a touch of nature amidst the concrete jungle. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
